change.item: sic and unclear moved outside elements pubplaces, publisher, composer, hofclass, key, opus
p. 89, Em = key (not composer); p. 82 Fasanotti (not Fassanotti)
p. 92 Chopin not composer of Thematisches Verzeichniss
p. 90 2te Aufl edition, not composer. Corrected; p. 84 adjusted Ricci tagging
